text:
Augusto Armando Polo Campos (25 February 1932 – 17 January 2018) was a Peruvian composer. His vals "Regresa" was a number one hit internationally for Peruvian singer Lucha Reyes, and again in an instrumental form for Peruvian electronic band Madre Matilda. One of his songs was included in the James Bond movie "Quantum of Solace".
Polo Campos died of complications from diabetes in Lima on 17 January 2018 at the age of 85.
